item.title: Created a "Karma" Page
item.content:encoded:
I noticed that the pave Billy-Club is currently the only discussion of Karma on the Wiki. I quickly wrote up an actual page discussing Karma and what can be done with it.

Perhaps it would be a good idea to edit the menus to link to the Karma bar (once it's been revised by a few people with better writing style than me), and modify the BillyClub article to talk more solely about BillyClub (including things that are not discussed now, like the Festival giveaways and occasional access to betas)?

Community opinions, please.
